name: Web Check
short_description: All-in-one tool for analyzing and monitoring websites.
description: All-in-one tool for analyzing and monitoring websites. Web Check is a self-hosted application focused on tools, network, utility, monitoring. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Web Check on your home server to all-in-one tool for analyzing and monitoring websites without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Web Check to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
